Literature.Title: Hydrophobic Control of the Bioactivity and Cytotoxicity of de Novo-Designed Antimicrobial Peptides.
Literature.Author: Gong H, Zhang J, Hu X, Li Z, Caiaffa KS, Liu H, Waigh TA, McBain A, Lu JR

Literature.Title: de Novo-designed antimicrobial peptides with broad-spectrum antimicrobial potency and rapid wound disinfection
Literature.Reference: Colloid Surf A Physicochem Eng Asp. 2023;667:131355
Literature.Author: Zheng YF, Chen SX, Mao KJ, Zhu XY, Jiang MY, Wu CJ, Lu JR, Zhu H

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=2000 µM,Mouse fibroblasts NIH 3T3:IC50=137 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:IC50=117 µM,Sheep erythrocytes:20% Hemolysis=>250 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=5.7±2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=9.3±3µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=128±40µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=2.4±1µM),Escherichia coli BL21(MIC=15.6µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 700926(MIC=15.6µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=15.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538P(MIC=7.8µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=3.9µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=62.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=125µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 400(MIC=125µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=125µM)
